DIMEKETEKITO_NAR_01: Hi! This minigame id called Dime Ke Te kito!
DIMEKETEKITO_NAR_02: You know you need to do? Dismantle the Mostro, dragging each of its parts to the boat that best comes to save him.
DIMEKETEKITO_NAR_03: Do not hurry, because if you miss the pot ...
PREGUNTATOR_NAR_01: Welcome to Preguntator. I'll tell you how the game works.
PREGUNTATOR_NAR_02: I'll ask some questions, and you must answer them selecting the correct Mostro.
PREGUNTATOR_NAR_03: Very easy! Look carefully before answering, if you fail you have to start from the beginning. Although you can try as many times as you need.
PREGUNTATOR_NAR_04: Come! There are award a supplement for your really cool for your Mostro.
ARMAME_NAR_01: Look what fun! You have to place each Mostro in place.
ARMAME_NAR_02: Easy, right? Careful, some are hidden.
ARMAME_NAR_03: How long it will take to get the prize?
AKUERDATE_NAR_01: You have a good memory? Let's test it.
AKUERDATE_NAR_02: They will be appearing words, then disappear. Do you remember?
AKUERDATE_NAR_04: The surprise of this game is so cool, do not miss it!
SELEC_PROF_02: Choose who you want to accompany you during the game, you will be the one to explain how everything works. Let's fun!
